documents.document:
Motorola ATRIX 2 Specs And Features

Motorola ATRIX 2 is the very latest 3G GSM cell phone which is having very eye catchy body look. The Phone work only with AT&T's HSPA+ network, which supports 2G (GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900) and 3G (HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100) networks.

Cell Phone is having 4.3 inches touchscreen with 540 x 960 pixels resolution and 16M colors. Other features Gorilla Glass display, Touch sensitive controls, MOTOBLUR UI with Live Widgets, Multi-touch input method, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate and Proximity sensor for auto turn-off.

Device Operating System is powered by Googleâ€™s Android v2.3 Gingerbread, which also has Dual-core 1GHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor with ULP GeForce GPU, Tegra 2 AP20H chipset CPU, 1 GB RAM memory is inbuilt on phone to run phone smoothly. Phone is coming with 8 GB internal memory to store huge data, there is also an option to upgrade memory with microSD card which supports up to 32GB external memory.

It has 8 Mega Pixel camera with 3264x2448 pixels, autofocus, LED flash which clicks HD quality videos (1080p) and still images, Camera has Geo-tagging and image stabilization features and also has front facing video calling camera.

Phone comes with various type of connectivity features such like GPRS, EDGE, 3G, Wi-Fi, v2.1 Bluetooth with A2DP and microUSB v2.0. The features will make always connected with world and allows to share and receive newest updates.

Unlocked Motorola ATRIX 2 inbult features are Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic, HDMI port, Digital compass, MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+ player, 1080p MP4/H.263/H.264.WMV/Xvid/DivX @ 30 fps playback, Photo viewer/editor, Quickoffice document editor, Adobe Flash player, Organizer, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Push Email, Java MIDP emulator, HTML Web Browser, GPS, Games etc.

Phone has excellent battery backup long talk time up to 8 hours 30 minutes and 384 hours standby time.

Motorola EX119 (Unlocked Quadband) Dual Sim GSM Cell Phone

Motorola EX119 supports dual GSM SIM in single cell phone. It is capable to support 32GB external memory for heavy storage images, songs, videos and other of data and comes with 50 MB internal memory. Phone is having 2.4 inches of TFT touchscreent with 176 x 220 pixels resolution. Motorola EX119 has 3.15 MP camera to click images and videos (@14fps) which has 2048x1536 pixels resolution. Phone also has very fantastic battery backup talk time up to 8 h 20 min and standby time up to 680 h standby time it has. Phone is capable to play MP4/H.264/H.263 player, MP3/WAV/AAC+ player and Stereo FM radio; it also has 3.5 mm jack and loudspeaker. It has Wi-Fi to get fast internet on phone and also has GPRS and EGDE, Other features like Bluetooth and microUSB v2.0 to exchange data with other device. Unlocked Motorola EX119 is inbuilt with Dual SIM (dual stand-by), Organizer, Java MIDP 2.0, 2.0/xHTML browser, SMS, MMS, Email, IM, Voice memo etc.

Nokia C2-03 Touch and Type (Unlocked Dualband)

Nokia C2-03 is a Dual SIM GSM phone, it is also known as touch and type phone. It is slider phone with cute look, its dimension 103 x 51.4 x 17 mm and 115 g weight. 2.6 inches of TFT touchscreen is inbuilt with phone which has 56k colors and 240 x 320 pixels resolutions. For huge storage on phone users can insert external microSD memory up to 32GB and 10 MB is inbuilt memory of the phone. Nokia C2-03 has 2 Mega Pixel camera to capture images and videos (QCIF@15fps). MP4/H.264/H.263 player and MP3/AAC/WAV player media player is inbuilt on phone, it also has FM radio which also allows to record favorite songs while listening radio. The talk time of 5 hours, 400 hours standby time and it can play music player continuously up to 37 hours. Unlocked Nokia C2-03 comes with Easy Swap SIM support (no reboot required), FlashLite support, Organizer, Java MIDP 2.1, Games, 2.0/xHTML Web Browser, SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm jack etc.

Sony Ericsson W810i Satin Black (Unlocked Reconditioned) GSM

Sony Ericsson W810i is a 2G phone supports GSM network. It has 100 x 46 x 19.5 mm dimension and 99 g weight. 1.9 inches display is coming with this device which has 256K colors and 176 x 220 pixels resolution.

Phone supports up to 4GB external memory and 512MB memory comes with new phone box. 20MB is inbuilt to save contacts and for other internal use of phone. It is equipped with 2 Mega Pixel camera to capture images and videos.

Li-Po 900 MAH (BST-37) battery gives excellent battery backup up to 8 hours and up to 350 hours standby time. EDGE, GPRS, Bluetooth and MicroUSB comes with this cell phone which helps to connect internet on cell phones and exchanging of data with other device.

Unlocked Sony Ericsson W810i is equipped with MP3/AAC/MP4 player, Video player, Stereo FM radio with RDS, Loudspeaker, SMS, MMS, Email, Instant Messaging, Web Browser, Java, Games, Picture editor, SyncML, Organizer etc.

LG CF360 BLACK (ATT UNLOCKED Quadband) GSM Cell Phone

LG CF360 works on both 2G and 3G cell phone. It is slider in design, having 101 x 48 x 17 mm dimension and 100 g weight. In 3G connectivity phone will access high speed internet up to 3.6 Mbps in HSDPA.

It is coming with 2.0 inches of TFT display with 240 x 320 pixels resolution and 65k colors. It is equipped with 1.3 camera with 1280 x 1024 pixels to capture images and videos on cell phone.

Phones is having Li-Ion 900 MAH battery that gives talk time up to 3 hours and 250 hours standby time. It is also equipped with GPS to find place on phone with the help of GPS maps.

Its internal memory is 10 MB and it supports 8 GB microSD external memory to store songs, images videos and other important data. To connect with internet there is 3G, GPRS, EDGE connectivity on phone and to share and exchange data with other device and computer it has Bluetooth and microUSB.

Unlocked LG CF360 is equipped with MP4/H.263/H.264/WMV player, MP3/eAAC+/WMA player, MP4/H.263/H.264/WMV player, Organizer, Voice memo, Java MIDP 2.0, SMS, MMS, Email, HTML Web Browser, Games, Loudspeaker etc.

BlackBerry Storm 2 9550 (Unlocked Quadband)

The RIM BlackBerry Storm 2 adds Wi-Fi, more memory, and an updated operating system that brings a number of feature and user interface enhancements. The revamped SurePress touch screen allows for more precision, key rollover, and limited multitouch capabilities.The Storm 2 offers a revamped SurePress touch screen that, coupled with the updated BlackBerry operating system, provides a better user experience. You also get Wi-Fi, double the memory, enhancements to the smartphone's core functions, and a more stable system.

Samsung Rugby II

The sporty Samsung Rugby II for AT&T is specially designed for rugged outdoor use and supports one-button, push-to-talk connectivity. The Rugby II combines military spec (810G) durability and 3G features in one solid phone, as well as GPS, a 2.0 megapixel camera/ camcorder and Bluetooth compatibility. This advanced flip phone also supports mobile email, PC tethering for use as a modem, and is even pre-loaded with lots of free apps. Stay in touch in the field with AT&T Video Share, or take a break and listen to your favorite music.

Motorola - Cliq Mobile Phone (Unlocked)

Motorola Cliq is an also know as Motorola DEXT MB220. It is a GSM device which supports both 2G and 3G networks. Device is runs with Android OS www.5 (Cupcake) and has 528 MHz ARM 11 processor, Adreno 130 GPU, Qualcomm MSM7201A chipset.

It comes with 3.1 inches of TFT capacitive touchscreen256K colors and 320 x 480 pixels resolution. For better images and video (QVGA@24fps (MP4)) capturing Motorola has given 5 mega pixel autofocus camera with Geo-tagging feature.

It is also capable to run high speed internet up to 7.2 Mbps with 3G connectivity. Users can also access internet with GPRS, EDGE and Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth and microUSB v2.0 is also equipped for sharing data with other device.

Li-Ion 1420 MAH battery comes with this cell phone which can give talk time up to 6 hours and 320 hours standby time.

Unlocked Motorola Cliq is also having lots of features for users like Noise cancellation with dedicated microphone, Google Maps with Street View, Document viewer, iMeem Mobile, Java MIDP emulator, GPS, Games, SMS, MMS, Email, MP3 and Mp4 player, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm Jack, Organizer, Games etc.

Motorola Cliq has 1 GB internal storage with 256MB RAM, 512MB ROM, there is also an option to upgrade memory up to 32GB with the help of microSD external memory card, 2 GB memory card comes with new phone.

Sony Ericsson W350i BLUE (Unlocked) GSM Cell Phone

Sony Ericsson W350i is beautiful GSM cell phone supports 2G network. Its dimension 104 x 43 x 10.5 mm and it is also a light weight cell phone 80 g. It comes with 1.9 inches of TFT display which has 256K colors and 176 x 220 pixels resolution. Phone has 14 MB internal space, it supports up to 4 GB external memory. 1.3 MP camera is inbuilt to click photos with 1280x1024 pixels. Users can access web with GPRS and EDGE connectivity Bluetooth and microUSB also available to exchange data with other device. Unlocked Sony Ericsson W350i comes with lots of features like Walkman player, TrackID music recognition, Loudspeaker, Stereo FM radio with RDS, HTML Web Browser, Picture editor, Games, SMS, EMS, MMS, Email, Instant Messaging etc. Sony Ericsson W350i is equipped with Li-Po 780 MAH battery which gives talk time up to 7 hours and 300 hours standby time, it is also capable to play continuously up to 15 hours.

Nokia C5-06 Touchscreen Phone Specs

Nokia C5-06 is the new upcoming gadget by Nokia company which is expected to release on December 2011. It will support 2G GSM network (GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900). Phone is having dimension of 105.8 x 51 x 13.8 mm, 65 cc and has very light weight of 93 g.

Device will run with Symbian OS v9.4 Series 60 rel. 5 which is also having 600 MHz processor CPU. It is also inbuilt with 128 MB RAM, 256 MB ROM to run device fast. The phones has having 40 MB of internal memory which is can be upgrade up to 16GB with microSD external memory card.

Nokia has given 3.2 inches of TFT resistive touchscreen with 16M colors and 360 x 640 pixels. Screen also has Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate and Handwriting recognition features. 2 Mega Pixel camera is inbuilt inside the phone to capture images and videos (VGA@15fps) and Geo-tagging features also integrated.

Nokia C5-06 has fabulous battery power it has 11:30 hours of talktime and it can stay on up to 600 hours in standby mode. Users can play music player continuously up to 35 hours in this phone with the help of Li-Ion 1000 mAh (Bl-4U).

With the help of Wi-Fi users can access high speed internet on cell phone, Device doesnâ€™t have 3G connectivity but with help of GPRS and EDGE users can access web quite fast. Phone also has Bluetooth and v2.0 microUSB for sharing data with other device.

Phone also has dozen of features like GPS with Nokia Maps, MP4 and MP3 player, Stereo FM radio, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm jack, QuickOffice document viewer, Adobe Flash Lite 3.1, MIDP 2.0 Java support, Photo editor, SMS, MMS, Email, IM, HTML Browser, Games + Downloadable etc.

Samsung Captivate Glide Android Phone Specs

Samsung Captivate Glide is the newly announced GSM cell phone by Samsung Company. It is will have powerful Android v2.3 Gingerbread OS with 1GHz Nvidia Tegra 2 AP20H dual core processor and 1 GB RAM also included for fast operating of phone. It will work on GSM 2G and 3G network.

It is expected to be release on October month of 2011. Device has large 4.0 inches of Super AMOLED Gorilla Glass touchscreen with 480 x 800 pixels and 16M colors. Display feature TouchWiz UI, Multi-touch input method, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Touch-sensitive controls, Proximity sensor for auto turn-off, Gyro sensor and QWERTY keyboard.

With its 8 Mega Pixel camera users can captures high quality photos and videos 1080p@30fps. Camera has other features like autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, touch focus, face and smile detection. 1.3 MP camera also inbuilt with this cool device for video calls. Phone has 8 GB of internal memory for data storage, users also has option to upgrade memory up 32 GB with microSD card.

For good experience of web accessing Samsung has given 3G facility to run fast internet on cell phone. It also has other connectivity features like Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPRS, EDGE, microUSB, GPS etc. It is also a good social networking device which will always connect with family and friends via Mail, Facebook, Twitter, Picasa, YouTube, Google Talk etc.

Samsung Captivate Glide other features Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic, Digital compass, Document viewer, Image/video editor, Adobe Flash support, Image/video editor, Java MIDP emulator, MP3 and Mp4 player, Stereo FM radio with RDS, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm jack, SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, RSS etc.

Apple iPhone 4S 64GB (Unlocked Quadband)

Apple iPhone 4S is the newest cell phone by Apple. It has 3 models which are divided with its internal memory; it comes with 16/32/64 GB and it doesnâ€™t have external memory card slot. It is also capable to run both CDMA and GSM networks. Phone runs with iOS 5 along with 1 GHz dual-core ARM Cortex-A9 processor.

3.5 inches LED-backlit IPS TFT touchscreen is fitted in phone which has 16M colors and 640 x 960 pixels resolution. Scratch-resistant oleophobic surface, Multi-touch input method, Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate, Three-axis gyro sensor and Proximity sensor for auto turn-off this features makes easy to handle touch screen.

8 Mega Pixel autofocus camera is inbuilt with this device which gives the excellent quality of images and videos (1080p@30fps). It also has VGA video calling camera to enjoy video calls.

Apple iPhone 4s is inbuilt with various type of connectivity options such has GPRS, EDGE, 3G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, microUSB, GPS etc. It is also inbuilt with many social networking apps that will always connect users with family, friends and world with the help of Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, Picasa and many more.

Device has long talktime up to 14 hours (2G) / up to 8 hours (3G), 200 hours (2G) / up to 200 hours (3G) and device is capable to play music player up to 40 hours continuously.

Unlocked Apple iphone 4s 64GB is inbuilt with MicroSIM card support only, Scratch-resistant glass back panel, Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic, Siri natural language commands and dictation, iCloud cloud service, TV-out, Digital compass, GPS, Google Maps, Audio/video player and editor, Image editor, iMessage, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, Safari Web Browser, Games etc.

Samsung C3520 (Unlocked Quadband) Flip GSM Cell Phone

Samsung C3520 supports 2G network which runs in GSM network. It is a flip phone which has dimension of 102 x 52 x 16.8 mm. 2.4 inches of TFT display is inbuilt with this device which has 240 x 320 pixels resolution. 1.3 Mega Pixel camera is coming with this device to capture images and videos. Phone supports up to 16GB external memory to upload songs, images, videos and other data 28 MB memory is inbuilt inside phone. Li-Ion 800 MAH battery is coming with phone which can give talk time up to 11 hours and 20 minutes and 500 hours standby time. Other inbuilt features of Unlocked Samsung C3520 are MP3/AAC player, MP4/H.263 player, Stereo FM radio and FM recording, SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email, IM, GPRS, EDGE, Bluetooth, microUSB, Web Browser, Games etc.

Motorola V3XX Blue (Unlocked Quadband) GSM Flip Phone

[url=][/url]Motorola V3XX is a folding slim designed cell phone. It supports both 2G and 3G GSM network. The phone has 107 g weight and dimension 103 x 53 x 15 mm, 80 cc. Phone comes with 1.3 Mega Pixel camera with videos recording and video calling camera. 2.2 inches TFT display is fitted inside device which has 240 x 320 pixels resolution and 256K colors. [url=]Motorola V3XX[/url] comes with 50 MB of internal memory and also supports external microSD card memory to store huge data on cell phone. In 3G connectivity users can run high speed internet up to 3.6 Mbps HSDPA band, to surf web on cell phone it also has other accessing features like GPRS and EDGE. Users can exchange there data with help of Bluetooth and microUSB. Cell phone is equipped with Li-Ion 940 MAH battery which can give talk time up to 3 hours and 290 hours standby time. Unlocked Motorola V3XX is inbuilt with MP3/AAC/AAC+ player, Java MIDP 2.0, Games, Loudspeaker, SMS, EMS, MMS, Email, Instant Messaging, Web Browser and many more.

Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 WHITE (Unlocked Quadband)

Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 is also called Samsung Galaxy Suit S5670 it runs on 2G and 3G GSM network. It has powered with Android OS v2.2 (Froyo), upgradable to v2.3 and has 600 MHz processor for fast operating of apps on phone, 280 MB RAM memory is also fitted with this cool phone. It is a good looking cell phone having dimension 110.2 x 61.2 x 12.6 mm and weight 108 g. It comes with 3.3 inches touchscreen with 65k colors and 240 x 320 pixels resolution. Display features Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, TouchWiz v3.0 UI and Proximity sensor for auto turn-off. 5 Mega Pixel camera is inbuilt with this smartphone which is capable to capture high quality of images and videos QVGA@15fps, Geo-tagging and smile detection features also added on phone. Unlocked Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 comes with lots of attractive inbuilt features like SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, Digital compass, MP4/H.264/H.263 player, MP3/WAV/eAAC+ player, Document viewer/editor, Image/video editor, Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Calendar, Google Talk, Picasa integration, Stereo FM radio with RDS, Wi-Fi, GPRS, EDGE, 3G, Bluetooth, Games etc. Cell Phone comes with Li-Ion 1350 MAh battery which will provide talk time up to 10:40 hours and standby time up to 642 hours.

Huawei U8520 Duplex Features And Specs

Huawei U8520 Duplex is a new GSM Dual SIM 3G cell phone coming on this October 2011. It is a GSM cell phone supports both 2G and 3G network. The design of the device looks pretty having dimension of 112 x 57 x 12.7 mm and also has light weight 110 g. v2.2 (Froyo) Android Operating System is powered in this cell phone to, 600 MHz processor, Adreno 200 GPU, Qualcomm MSM7227 chipset is included to move phone faster.

3.2 inches TFT touchscreen is fitted to view large icons. The display has 16M colors and 320 x 480 pixels resolution. Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate, Proximity sensor for auto turn-off and Touch-sensitive controls features makes easy to control display. 3.15 Mega Pixel camera is also inbuilt inside the phone which gives clear videos and photos, and Huawei has given VGA camera to enjoy video calling.

Huawei U8520 Duplex is loaded with the best connectivity features to access internet and data sharing. With the help of 3G and Wi-Fi connectivity phone can access high speed while surfing web on phone, GPRS and EDGE are also available on phone which supports on 2G network. With the help of Bluetooth and microUSB users can exchange data with other device.

Huawei U8520 Duplex is inbuilt with Digital compass, GPS, Document viewer, Adobe Flash support, Photo viewer/editor, Organizer, Java MIDP emulator, Stereo FM radio, MP3/WAV/eAAC+ player, MP4/H.263/H.264 player, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm Jack, Web Browser, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Games and many more features.

Phone has 150 MB, 512 MB ROM, 256 MB RAM internal space to store data and there is also a microSD card slot which is capable to support up to 32GB external memory card.Li-Ion 1500 mAh is comes with phone which give talk time up to 7 h 30 min in both 2G and 3G networks and 360 hours (2G) / up to 120 h (3G) standby time.

Motorola ATRIX 2 (Unlocked Quadband) GSM Cell phone

Motorola ATRIX 2 is the very latest 3G GSM cell phone which is having very eye catchy body look. The Phone work only with AT&Tâ€™s HSPA+ network, which supports 2G (GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900) and 3G (HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100) networks.

Cell Phone is having 4.3 inches touchscreen with 540 x 960 pixels resolution and 16M colors. Other features Gorilla Glass display, Touch sensitive controls, MOTOBLUR UI with Live Widgets, Multi-touch input method, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate and Proximity sensor for auto turn-off.

Device Operating System is powered by Googleâ€™s Android v2.3 Gingerbread, which also has Dual-core 1GHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor with ULP GeForce GPU, Tegra 2 AP20H chipset CPU, 1 GB RAM memory is inbuilt on phone to run phone smoothly. Phone is coming with 8 GB internal memory to store huge data, there is also an option to upgrade memory with microSD card which supports up to 32GB external memory.

It has 8 Mega Pixel camera with 3264Ã—2448 pixels, autofocus, LED flash which clicks HD quality videos (1080p) and still images, Camera has Geo-tagging and image stabilization features and also has front facing video calling camera.

Phone comes with various type of connectivity features such like GPRS, EDGE, 3G, Wi-Fi, v2.1 Bluetooth with A2DP and microUSB v2.0. The features will make always connected with world and allows to share and receive newest updates.

Unlocked Motorola ATRIX 2 inbult features are Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic, HDMI port, Digital compass, MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+ player, 1080p MP4/H.263/H.264.WMV/Xvid/DivX @ 30 fps playback, Photo viewer/editor, Quickoffice document editor, Adobe Flash player, Organizer, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Push Email, Java MIDP emulator, HTML Web Browser, GPS, Games etc.

Phone has excellent battery backup long talk time up to 8 hours 30 minutes and 384 hours standby time.

Nokia E6 Black WITH QWERTY KEYBOARD (Unlocked Quadband)

Nokia E6 is samartphone which runs with Symbian Anna OS and 680 MHz ARM 11 processor. Phone also has 2D/3D Graphics HW Accelerator with OpenVG1.1 and OpenGL ES 2.0 which makes cell phone better. Nokia has equipped 8 Mega Pixel camera which will give great experience of photography, camera has dual-LED flash, Geo-tagging and face detection. The has 8 GB internal spaces to save media files and other data, with the help of microSD memory card slot users can add external memory card up to 32GB. Unlocked Nokia E6 comes with lots of inbuilt features Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic, Digital compass, TV-out, MP4/H.264/H.263/RV player, MP3/WMA/WAV/RA/eAAC+ player, Stereo FM radio with RDS, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm jack, QuickOffice document editor (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF), Flash Lite 4.0, Java MIDP 2.1, SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email, IM, EDGE, GPRS, 3G high speed up to 10.2 Mbps, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Games etc. Nokia E6 is equipped with Li-Ion 1500 MAH battery which will give fabulous battery back talk time up to 14:48 hours and 681 hours standby time.

Samsung B3410 Noir Black CorbyPlus Unlocked Cell Phone

Samsung B3410 is beautifully designed GSM cell phone which works in 2G (GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900) network. Device is equipped with 2.6 inches TFT touchscreen with 256K colors, 240 x 320 pixels resolutions and QWERTY keyboard. Samsung has given 2 Mega pixel camera to records videos (QVGA@13fps) and images. Samsung B3410 comes with Li-Ion 960 MAH battery which gives long talktime up to 10 hours 40 minutes and standby time up to 640 hours. It supports 8 GB external microSD memory card for huge storage of data, its internal memory is 30MB. Device has Stereo FM radio with RDS FM recording now users can record songs while listening songs on Radio with this phone, it also has other sounds features like MP4/H.263/H.264 player, MP3/WAV/eAAC+/WMA player, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm jack. Unlocked Samsung B3410 comes with SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Gmail, Google Search, Widgets, HTML Web Browser, Games, Java MIDP 2.0, GPRS, EDGE, Bluetooth, v2.0 USB, Organizer etc.

Nokia 500 (Quadband Unlocked) Symbian Anna OS GSM Cell Phone

Nokia 500 is a 3G cell phone which runs with Nokiaâ€™s latest Opersting System Symbian Anna. The has got handsome look, 111.3 x 53.8 x 14.1 mm, 73 cc dimension and has light weight of 93 g. TFT 3.2 inches touchscreen is equipped with this smartphone, it is having 16M colors and 360 x 640 pixels resolution. Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate and Proximity for auto turn-off also included with this smart phone. Phone comes with 2 GB internal memory for data storage, with the help of microSD card slot users can upgrade memory up to 32GB. 1 GHz ARM 11 processor is inbuilt inside cell phone, 256 MB RAM and 512 MB ROM memory also included for fast processing of phone. Its 5 Mega Pixel camera allows to capture high quality Images and videos, it also has Geo-tagging and video calling VGA camera. Unlocked Nokia 500 inbuilt features Digital compass, MP4/H.263/H.264 player, MP3/WAV/?AAC+/WMA player, Photo editor, Organizer, Voice command/dial, Flash Lite 4.0, Stereo FM radio, SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, Games, Java MIDP 2.1, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm Jack etc.

Motorola Milestone XT720 Unlocked Phone with Android OS

If you have been looking for a phone that will fulfill all your requirements for enjoying modern mobile communication and entertainment features, you journey ends here. the Motorola MILESTONE XT720 will prove to be your ultimate destination.

It is a fabulous looking mobile phone that supports both 2G and 3G networks for GSM 850/ 900/ 1800/ 1900 and HSDPA 1700/ 2100.

This Motorola phone looks cool. The major credit goes to its flip profile and perfect measurements. The phone measures 116x60.9x10.9mm and weighs 160 grams.

When it comes to display, this phone works towards offering you the best.

The TFT capacitive touch screen measures 3.7 inches and displays awesome 16m colors at 480x854 pixels touch screen has also accommodated some interesting features including multi-touch input method, touch sensitive navigation controls, accelerometer sensor for UI auto rotate and proximity sensor for auto turn off.

You can benefit from talk time of up to 6 hours and standby time up to 365 hours with the help of standard lithium Lon battery included in to the phone.

A fabulous invention by Motorola.

Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 WHITE (Unlocked Quadband)

Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 is a mid range Smartphone and it come with TFT capacitive touch screen (240 x 320 pixels) 3.3 inches, 16M colors display and Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Touch Wiz v3.0 UI, Swype text input method, Proximity sensor for auto turn-off. It comes with (2592?1944 pixels) 5 Mega Pixel camera autofocus, Geo-tagging, smile detection it also capable to capture good quality of videos. Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 has Android OS, v2.2 (Froyo) Operating System and 600 MHz processor CPU and itâ€™s inbuilt space 160 MB and space can be upgrade with the help of miscroSD card slot 2GB memory comes with phone and it supports up to 32GB.

Handset comes with lots of attractive features like Loudspeaker, 3.5mm Jack, 3G 7.2 mbps speed, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, microUSB, SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, Stereo FM radio with RDS, Games, Stereo FM radio with RDS, Digital compass, SNS integration, MP4/H.264/H.263 player, MP3/WAV/eAAC+ player, Organizer, Document viewer/editor, Image/video editor, Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Calendar, Google Talk, Picasa integration Predictive text input etc.

Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 has excellent battery power which is capable to give up to Up to 10 h 40 min (2G) / Up to 6 h 40 min (3G) and Up to 642 h (2G) / Up to 421 h (3G) with the help of Li-Ion 1350 MAH Standard battery. Mobile phone is available in Black, white colors.

HTC ChaCha (Unlocked Quadband)

HTC ChaCha is a cute 3G cell phone by HTC Company. It works in both 2G and 3G GSM network. 120 g is the weight of cell phone and 114.4 x 64.6 x 10.7 mm is the dimension. 2.6 inches TFT capacitive touchscreen is equipped with this cell phone which also has QWERTY keyboard; the screen has 480 x 320 pixels resolutions and 256k colors. v2.3 Gingerbread Android OS and 800 MHz processor is fitted with this phone. HTC ChaCha gives good experience of photography with 5 Mega Pixel autofocus camera which is also capable to capture D1 (720x480 pixels) @ 30 fps videos, Geo-tagging and face detection features also inbuilt with device. 512 MB ROM and 512 MB RAM is inbuilt with the phone and it supports 32 GB microSD external memory card for huge storage of data. Unlocked HTC ChaCha is inbuilt with Facebook dedicated key, Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Google Talk, Picasa, Digital compass, MP3/AAC+/WAV/WMA player, MP4/H.264 player, Loudspeaker, 3.5 mm Jack, Document viewer/editor, Java MIDP emulator, GPS, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, GPRS, EDGE, Stereo FM radio with RDS, SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM and many more features. Li-Ion 1250 MAH is included for best battery backup, talktime up to 7:30 hours and standby time up to 430 hours.

LG Xenon GR500 (Unlocked Quadband) GSM Cell Phone

LG Xenon GR500 is a 3G cell phone which supports GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 network. It is having 2.8 inches touchscreen with 65K colors, 240 x 400 pixels and QWERTY keyboard. It comes with 80 MB internal memory which can be expend up to 16 GB with microSD external memory card to save huge data on cell phone. To capture images and videos it has 2 Mega Pixel camera with 1600x1200 pixels, flash and Geo-tagging features. GPRS, EDGE, 3G, Bluetooth, microUSB are the connectivity features of LG Xenon GR500. Company has equipped Li-Ion 950 MAH battery which will provide talk time up to 4 hours and 264 hours of standby time. Its dimension is 105.5 x 53.5 x 15.8 mm and 108 g is the weight of this cell phone. Unlocked LG Xenon GR500 comes with GPS, Java MIDP 2.0, MP4/3gp player, MP3/WAV/e-AAC+/WMA/AMR player, Photo/video editor, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, RSS, IM, HTML web browser, Loudspeaker etc.
